data.text:
Table of Biography

Mike Herrera is an American musician. Mike Herrera is an extremely talented artist. Likewise, he is a member of the band MxPx.

Early Life and Childhood

Mikeâs full name is Michael Arthur Herrera. He was born on November 6, 1976. As of 2024, Mike is 47 years old. Similarly, he was born in Bremerton, Washington. He is of American nationality. Likewise, he is of the birth sign Scorpio.

He was born in a family of 5 members which includes Mike himself, his parents, and 2 of his siblings. His parentsâ names are Art Herrera(Father) and Michele Herrera(Mother). However, the names of his siblings are not available on the web. During his childhood, he started learning how to play guitar.

Education

About his educational background, Mike has most likely graduated high school. However, details like the names of his schools and colleges are not available.

Mike hasnât shared any information related to his personal life. It seems like he doesnât like to share all the details of his life on the internet. Thus, information regarding the musicianâs educational qualifications isnât available.

Career and Professional Life

Mike is a professional musician. He debuted with the American pop-punk band MxPx. The band first debuted in the year 1992. He along with his friends created this band when they were in high school. Likewise, Mike holds the position of the vocalist and the bassist of the band. The band has released many songs including both singles and albums. However, the band isnât as active in the present as it used to be back when they first started.

Moreover, he is also part of another band called Mike Herreraâs Tumbledown. This second band of his has a different genre than his first band âMxPxâ. Mike Herreraâs Tumbledown is more into country rock type of music. Likewise, he has been on tours with his bands all around the world. People from all around the globe listen to their music.

Other than the above-mentioned facts, he also has released a few solo songs. After his first band was a little inactive, he released singles on his own. Those songs reflected more of Mikeâs style. Similarly, he is a very talented musician who has inspired a lot of people with his music.

Furthermore, he has worked under famous labels like Tooth and Nail Records, Fat Wreck Chords, Side One Dummy Records, and A&M Records. With his passion for music, he is still active as a musician to date. He is very talented as he can sing and play the guitar equally well.

Net Worth 2024

Mike has a total net worth of $3 million. He earns most of his earnings through his profession. Similarly, he is earning money doing things he loves. He makes money out of the sales of the albums and the records of his songs. However, Mike hasnât revealed the accurate stats of his income yet. Likewise, his monthly salary is also not available at the moment.

Relationship Status

Mike Herrera is married to a woman named Holli. The couple got married in the year 2001. Sadly, the details of how they first met and got together are not available Mike and his wife have a daughter and a son of their own. However, their names are not revealed.

Other than his marriage, there are no records of him being in a relationship with anyone else. In the present, he lives with his wife and his children in Waco, Texas. Moreover, Mike is sometimes seen posting pictures of his kids and his family on his social media accounts.

Mike Herrera â Body Measurements

Mike Herrera stands at the height of 5 feet 8 inches. Likewise, he naturally had black hair that had now started to turn grey. Mike has brown eyes and a piercing on his lips as well. Another distinctive feature of the musicianâs body is his tattoo-covered arms and most of his neck. However, the rest of his body measurements are not obtainable at the moment as he hasnât revealed them himself.

Mike Herrera â Social Media

Mike Herrera is pretty active on different social media. He is available on platforms like Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook. Similarly, on Instagram, Mike has the username @mikeherreratd. His account is officially verified by Instagram. He has accumulated 88.7k followers on his account so far.

Furthermore, he has posted 4179 posts on his feed so far. Mike is available on Twitter as @mikeherreraTD. He has accumulated 23.4k followers on his account so far. Moreover, he also uses Facebook.
